info.description: Allows the viewing of Options of the Entitlements, approval awaiting Entitlements and management of the Entitlements
info.title: API for entitlement update and reports

get.description: Retrieves the list of all pending entitlements

parameters.name: diaryId
parameters.description: The identifier of the diary

parameters.name: portfolioId
parameters.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.description: Event Type of the corporate action

parameters.name: accountOfficerId
parameters.description: The identifier of the department head or specific account officer responsible for the customer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

get.description: Retrieves the list of all unauthorised entitlements for approval

parameters.name: diaryId
parameters.description: The identifier of the diary

parameters.name: portfolioId
parameters.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.description: Event Type of the corporate action

parameters.name: accountOfficerId
parameters.description: The identifier of the department head or specific account officer responsible for the customer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: entitlementId
parameters.description: The identifier of the entitlement

parameters.name: entitlementId
parameters.description: The identifier of the entitlement

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

get.description: Updates the buy sell rights holdings

parameters.name: entitlementId
parameters.description: The identifier of the entitlement

parameters.name: entitlementId
parameters.description: The identifier of the entitlement

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

portfolioName.description: The name that is displayed for the portfolio

instrumentName.description: The name that is displayed for the instrument, taken from the Security Master

qualifyingHolding.description: The Portfolio's holding in the original security

depositoryName.description: The name that is displayed for the depository

exDate.description: All holders of the Security, specified as of this date are entitled to the event

payDate.description: The date on which corporate cash is actually paid to shareholder

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

rightsInstrumentId.description: Security Number of the Rights Security which is being issued

rightsInstrumentName.description: Name of the Rights Security which is being issued

eventType.description: Event Type of the corporate action

eventName.description: The name that is displayed for the event

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

portfolioName.description: The name that is displayed for the portfolio

instrumentName.description: The name that is displayed for the instrument, taken from the Security Master

qualifyingHolding.description: The Portfolio's holding in the original security

depositoryName.description: The name that is displayed for the depository

exDate.description: All holders of the Security, specified as of this date are entitled to the event

payDate.description: The date on which corporate cash is actually paid to shareholder

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

rightsInstrumentId.description: Security Number of the Rights Security which is being issued

rightsInstrumentName.description: Name of the Rights Security which is being issued

eventType.description: Event Type of the corporate action

eventName.description: The name that is displayed for the event

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

optionQuantity.description: The quantity of the option trade

dividendRateInOptionCurrency.description: The Dividend rate in Option Currency

entitlementAmount.description: The amount resulting from the execution of a corporate action that the portfolio owner is entitled to receive

defaultOption.description: Indicates whether the option will be selected by default if no instruction is provided by the account owner

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

commissionAmount.description: Amount of commission charged for the payment created with respect to the commission type used.

customerCommissionTax.description: Specifies the tax amount based on the commission charged

chargeAmount.description: Retrieves the Charge Amount after redeem

optionReplyByDate.description: The corporate action cut-off date to choose a particular option.

optionReplyByTime.description: The corporate action cut-off time to choose a particular option.

newInstrumentId.description: The identifier of a new instrument

ratio.description: The ratio in which new shares are offered

price.description: The Price at which the nominal amount of the Security is to be valued for the transaction.

bookCost.description: Book cost is equal to the asset's carrying value on the balance sheet

sellBuyOptionDescriptions.description: The description of the sell/buy Option

sellBuyOptionDescription.description: The description of the sell/buy Option

instrumentName.description: The name that is displayed for the instrument, taken from the Security Master

optionQuantity.description: The quantity of the option trade

taxAmount.description: Total amount of taxes applicable on all commission or charges calculated for the transaction/payment.

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

qualifyingHolding.description: The Portfolio's holding in the original security

eventQuantity.description: Nominal amount provided by the Depository / Issuer

currency.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

optionSelected.description: The option selected from the total number of options available

overOptionDescription.description: Option description or indicator for oversubscription

overSubscriptionPrice.description: Holds the price at which Over subscribed quantity is to be sold

overSubscribedQuantity.description: Holds Amount of additional shares that the user want to subscribe

accountCurrency.description: Currency of the account. For example: USD, GBP.

initialSourceTaxAmount.description: Amount of Source Tax that has previously been debited by initiator of the Corporate Action

foreignFee.description: This field Records the Foreign Fee amount charged to the Customer for the trade.

commissionAmount.description: Amount of commission charged for the payment created with respect to the commission type used.

customerCommissionTax.description: Specifies the tax amount based on the commission charged

exchangeRate.description: Contains the exchange rate returned from the system. i.e. For entries over foreign currency accounts, this contains the rate which used to convert the currency amount to the local equivalent at the time of the originating transaction.

referenceCurrencyExchangeRate.description: Exchange rate between the Portfolio Reference Currency and the Local Currency

foreignFeeTax.description: The tax calculated on the foreign charges

netAmountInAccountCurrency.description: The net amount due to or from the Customer after +/- Charges

externalCustodian.description: The external custodian where position is held

eventCurrency.description: Currency in which the event occurs

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

options.description: The usable options for the override

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

sellBuyOptionDescription.description: The description of the sell/buy Option

sellBuyOptionNo.description: Option number is mapped from tag 13A in Option details sequence

sellBuySec.description: Denotes the rights security number for which there is an option to sell or buy rights

optionReplyByDate.description: The corporate action cut-off date to choose a particular option.

tradeFromDate.description: Specifies the Start date of action (Trading) period for the option

tradeToDate.description: Specifies the End date of action (Trading) period for the option

sellBuyQuantity.description: The quantity of rights being sold or underlying security or rights security being purchased

price.description: The Price at which the nominal amount of the Security is to be valued for the transaction.

tradeDate.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

considAmount.description: The consideration amount to be received or paid in the event currency (Quantity x Price).

tradeReference.description: The Id of the SEC.TRADE generated

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

subAccount.description: The sub-account that the security position is held in.

eventType.description: Event Type of the corporate action

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

qualifyingHolding.description: The Portfolio's holding in the original security

netNominal.description: Denotes the sum of the Quantity

generateInstruction.description: Specifies whether MT565 has to be generated

MT566Confirmation.description: Specifies whether the transaction status will be updated based on the incoming MT566 confirmation

MT566Ref.description: When set to processed, the security trade is created and authorised and the reference number is updated once the MT566 confirmation is received

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

sellBuyOptionNo.description: Option number is mapped from tag 13A in Option details sequence

sellBuySec.description: Denotes the rights security number for which there is an option to sell or buy rights

tradeFromDate.description: Specifies the Start date of action (Trading) period for the option

considAmount.description: The consideration amount to be received or paid in the event currency (Quantity x Price).

tradeReference.description: The Id of the SEC.TRADE generated

generateInstruction.description: Specifies whether MT565 has to be generated

MT566Confirmation.description: Specifies whether the transaction status will be updated based on the incoming MT566 confirmation

MT566Ref.description: When set to processed, the security trade is created and authorised and the reference number is updated once the MT566 confirmation is received
